enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
sentences: On capacity building under the UNFCCC (FCCC/2006/5, MISC.4, and MISC.4/Corr.1), JAPAN said the monitoring process should be streamlined.
The US noted the need to avoid monitoring requirements that hinder implementation.
The G-77/CHINA called for an expert workshop.
The RUSSIAN FEDERATION, with BELARUS, stressed consideration of the experiences and needs of EITs.
On capacity building under the Protocol, parties considered relevant reports on this item (FCCC/SBI/2006/5 and FCCC/SBI/2006/MISC.4).
A contact group on capacity building under both the Convention and the Protocol was formed, co-chaired by Crispin d'Auvergne (St. Lucia) and Anders Turesson (Sweden).
